com.acmetelecom

Interface IBillingSystem

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    BillingSystem

    public interface IBillingSystem
    The billing system interface which all billing systems should implement.

        Called when a call is ended.

        caller - The caller phone number.
        callee - The callee phone number.

        Called when a call is started.

        callee - The callee phone number.

      • createCustomerBills

        java.util.ArrayList<Bill> createCustomerBills()
        Creates bills for all customers, prints them out and returns them as a list of type Bill.
        Returns:
        ArrayList The list of created bills, one per customer.
